message.content:
<<<api>>>: ImageIO.write
<<<code>>>: 
ImageIO.write(b1, "png", outputfile);
ImageIO.write(b2, "png", outputfile1);
<<<explanation>>>: The quality loss is due to the compression of the JPEG format. If you want to maintain the quality of the image, you should use a lossless format like PNG. So, instead of writing the image as "jpg", write it as "png". This will maintain the quality of the image but the file size will be larger.
